newsitem.title: USA: IAT Multimedia to buy Trend Plus GmbH.
newsitem.headline: IAT Multimedia to buy Trend Plus GmbH.

text.p: IAT Multimedia Inc said on Tuesday it planned to acquire 90 percent of the common stock of Trend Plus GMBH, a Swiss mobile communications provider, in exchange for $4 million of convertible preferred stock.

Trend Plus provides mobile communications to professional clients requiring specialized voice, data and picture transfer capabilities. IAT designs, develops, makes and markets visual communications systems.
The deal was expected to close in 30 days.
Trend Plus had sales of about $4.8 million for the year ended December 1996, IAT said. It had sales of about $3.9 milion in the first half of 1997.

Trend Plus had business relationships with Nortel Dasa, a joint venture with Daimler Benz Aerospace and Northern Telecom for Satlink-C mobile satellite terminals in Germany. It also had partnerships with Nukem GmbH and German Telecom Mobile Net GmbH, IAT Multimedia said.
"The acquisition of Trend Plus is a major milestone in the growth of IAT into a diversified multimedia communications provider," said Viktor Vogt, IAT co-chairman.
